file.name: example.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: example service
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:12000
paths:
  /item:
    post:
      description: create an item
      parameters:
        - in: header
          description: Bearer Auth
          name: Authorization
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/PostBody"
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          headers:
            location:
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
  /item/{id}:
    head:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: item found
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    delete:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '204':
          description: deleted
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: item found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item"
        404:
          description: not found
        4XX:
          description: some error
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  requestBodies:
    PostBody:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item'
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        messageIndex:
          type: number
      required:
        - message
        - messageIndex

    ChoiceWithExternalRef:
      oneOf:
        - type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          required:
            - type
          properties:
            type:
              type: string
              enum: ['choice1']
            field:
              type: string
        - $ref: "common.yaml#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem3"
      discriminator:
        propertyName: type

    ChoiceItem4:
      $ref: './nested-test/example.yaml#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem45'

    ChoiceWithExplicitMapping:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: "common.yaml#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem3"
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem4"
      discriminator:
        propertyName: type
        mapping:
          choice3: "common.yaml#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem3"
          choice4: "#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem4"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "ChoiceItem4": parse schema: resolve "./nested-test/example.yaml#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem45": find schema: external base "./nested-test/example.yaml" is not supported
